The happy husbandman: or, Country innocence. To a pleasant new court tune. This may be printed, R.P.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill. (woodcuts).
Printed for P. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball, in Pye-Corner, [London] : [1687]
Verse: "My young Mary do's mind the dairy ..." Place and date of publication suggested by Wing. Imperfect: trimmed and stained. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
